name: Vaporum
description: Vaporum is a grid-based dungeon crawler RPG in an original steampunk setting, inspired by old-school classics of the genre. Stranded in the middle of an ocean, in front of a gigantic tower, the hero has to find out what the place is, what happened there, and most importantly, who he is.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows: Vista SP1 (64-bit), 7 (64-bit), 8 (64-bit), 10 (64-bit) Processor: 2.5 Ghz Intel® Core™2 Duo Processor or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series 512 MB video card or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows: Vista SP1 (64-bit), 7 (64-bit), 8 (64-bit), 10 (64-bit) Processor: 3.5 Ghz Intel® i5 or AMD equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2 GB video card or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
